snippet: The whirring tools are sort of like electric toothbrushes for the face, leaving it feeling anywhere from glowing to raw.
abstract: Dermatologists generally support electronic facial-cleansing devices; most come with their own soaps, or serums intended to help with wrinkles or acne.
lead_paragraph: The whirring tools are sort of like electric toothbrushes for the face, leaving it feeling anywhere from glowing to raw.

headline.seo: Power Facial-Cleansing Brushes Gain in Popularity
headline.main: Skin Cleansing Enters the Electronic Age
headline.print_headline: Skin Cleansing Enters the Electronic Age
